resources.string: Welcome to Frank \'N\' Steins: a place where Frankers and Frankettes of all ages can come and enjoy some of the most delicious, one-of-a-kind Franks you\'ll ever taste!
We also host some of the finest Steins on tap as well as many delicious beers on bottle for our 19+ patrons.

Please enjoy our app. With it, you can check out our menu, get in contact with us, make a table reservation, get an estimation on your bill and even build your own custom Frank! Check out some of app features below:
